document.query: CREATE TABLE `promo_code_detail` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `promo_code_id` bigint(20), `product_id` bigint(20), `quantity` int(11), `discount_type` varchar(255), `discount` varchar(255), `discount_apply_on` varchar(255), `max_discount_amount` varchar(255), `type` varchar(255), `promo_code_usage` varchar(255), `apply_on_first` varchar(255), `start_date` varchar(255), `end_date` varchar(255), `applicability` varchar(255), `disabled` varchar(255), `created_at` varchar(255), `updated_at` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
